node.excerpt: A  Button  can display either text or an icon. It can be tapped and will run an  onTap  callback when tapped. It may optionally be toggled with each tap. Props Prop Type Default Notes text string "Get Started!” icon string ”none" See  Icon  below…

Tapping on a  Checkbox  will toggled it between on or off. Props Prop Type Default Notes value boolean false Whether the Checkbox is checked. disabled boolean false validation function (value) => true A callback that returns  true  or  false…
